channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- Workstation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- Workstation

item.title: CVE-2023-34044|2024-08-02T16:01:52.395Z -- vmware -- workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation( 17.x prior to 17.5) and Fusion(13.x prior to 13.5) contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that exists in the functionality for sharing host Bluetooth devices with the virtual machine.Â A malicious actor with local administrative privileges on a virtual machine may be able to read privileged information contained in hypervisor memory from a virtual machine.
